Package com.jidesoft.tooltip

The package contains the classes related to ToolTip type of component for JIDE Components product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BalloonShape BalloonShape is the interface to provide BalloonTip additional shapes.
ShadowComposite Shadow composite interface is responsible for compositing the color of the shadowing image, using different compositing rules, such as transparent or opaque.
ShadowStyle Shadow style defines different shadow casting style, including casting direction, whether it should be a perspective casting and the position relative the balloon popup.
 

Class Summary
BalloonTip BalloonTip is a special tooltip that has a balloon shape.
BalloonTipUI The UI for BalloonTip.
ShadowSettings Shadow composite interface is responsible for compositing the color of the shadowing image, using different compositing rules, such as transparent or opaque.
 

Package com.jidesoft.tooltip Description

The package contains the classes related to ToolTip type of component for JIDE Components product.
